infotexts.mlc.patchnotes:
OCCUPATIONAL HAZARDS
NEW FEATURES - Pirate base overhaul - Pirate bases are now presistant, destroy them and they won't come back - Pirate bases can now jam your sonar - If you have Dynamic Europa installed, having high rep with the bandit faction will turn pirate bases passive
- Map Features - Be on the lookout for hidden POIs
- New mission: Relay Repair - Similar to beacon stations but you solve a puzzle
- Thalamus Caves
CHANGES - Updated some of the pirate base - Some new pirate bases - Distress notifications are now displayed on the news ticker
Let me know how it feels! Contact @Dak#0001 on https://discord.gg/XFp5vq67MY
